text: Then how do I get started?

I often get this question
from risk management and compliance
leaders.

I usually respond with the three
lessons that I have learned

from customers with successful
cloud initiatives.

Firstly, train your risk management
and compliance teams in the fundamentals
of the cloud.

Find training that is relevant
to their job functions. AWS

offers free and paid courses
for these job functions

through the AWS Cloud Audit
Academy.

Secondly, start partnering
with your cloud teams as early
as possible.

Cloud aware risk management
and compliance professionals can

optimize the time and resources
spent on controls by participating

in the early stages of your
cloud projects.

And thirdly, become familiar
with AWS recommended

practices for getting started
with your cloud journey.

AWS offers guidance on different
aspects of organizing

your risk mitigation and compliance
efforts through the AWS Cloud

Foundations and AWS Well Architected
Programs.

Donâ€™t hesitate to reach out to
your AWS account teams to know

more about how AWS can help
with your risk mitigation

and compliance needs. Lastly,
check out the links to the training

and guidance in the description
below. Thanks for watching!
